div.p: Are there any systems that do distributed curation of the same content, such that each curator's end result would be a different subset?

I suppose if one considers the content to be the entire web, then things like twitter, delicious, etc are examples, but what about a forum or the comments on a blog post (where the curator decides what is signal and what is noise) and anyone could be a curator (of the forum and blog comments) presenting their own curated view (of the forum and blog comments).
Or what about a book that many people work together to write, and each curator decides which person's contribution to keep so that you would have a different version of that book from each curator.
